channel.title: Sources on stultus notes
channel.description: Recent content in Sources on stultus notes

item.title: Creativity is a Way of Operating - John Cleese
item.description: Creativity is not a talent, it is a way of operating.

item.title: Find Your Voice - Dan Harmon
item.description: Find your voice, shout it from the rooftops, and keep doing it until the people that are looking for you find you.

item.title: Show Your Work! by Austin Kleon
item.description: 10 ways to share your creativity and get discovered - a guide to showing your work and building an audience.

item.title: Screenwriting Storytelling Blueprint
item.description: Notes from the course ‘Screenwriting & Storytelling Blueprint: Hero’s Two Journeys’.

item.title: 9-1-1 (TV Series)
item.description: Wisdom and insights from the 9-1-1 TV series on decision-making and resilience.

item.title: Bazel BUILD Style Guide
item.description: Official Bazel style guide recommending DAMP over DRY for BUILD files.

item.title: Bhargavee Nilayam Filming Locations - Investigation
item.description: Investigation debunking the myth that Bhargavee Nilayam was shot at Nilambur DFO Bungalow.

item.title: Coachable, Learnable, and Intrinsic - Hiring Framework
item.description: Framework for understanding which skills are coachable, learnable, or intrinsic when hiring.

item.title: Decision Document Framework by Arnav Kumar
item.description: Arnav Kumar’s framework for writing comprehensive decision documents to get faster approvals.

item.title: Do Not Stand at My Grave and Weep - Mary Elizabeth Frye
item.description: Comforting poem about transcending death and being present in nature.

item.title: Eliminate the Impossible - Sherlock Holmes
item.description: Sherlock Holmes’s principle of deductive reasoning - eliminate the impossible.

item.title: Handle Me at My Worst - Marilyn Monroe
item.description: Quote about accepting someone’s flaws along with their strengths.

item.title: Hope Is a Good Thing - Shawshank Redemption
item.description: Quote about hope being the best of things that never dies.

item.title: Imperfection Is Beauty - Marilyn Monroe
item.description: Quote about embracing imperfection, madness, and being ridiculous over boring.

item.title: Listen to Your Instincts - Judith McNaught
item.description: Quote about following your instincts when they defy logic.

item.title: One OS to Rule Them All - Linux Parody
item.description: Parody of Tolkien’s Ring Verse celebrating Linux and open source.

item.title: Passion Not Spent - Caleb Madrigal
item.description: Poem about the fear of dying with passion unspent and not truly living.

item.title: Petition Against Ayyankali - 1914
item.description: Historical petition from 1914 showing resistance faced by social reformer Ayyankali.

item.title: Silence and Unspoken Words - Anshuman Dash
item.description: Quote about unspoken words and the gap between what we feel and what we say.

item.title: Some Birds Aren't Meant to Be Caged - Stephen King
item.description: Quote about birds too bright to be caged and missing friends who fly away.

item.title: State of AI-assisted Software Development 2025 (DORA Report)
item.description: DORA’s 2025 research on AI’s impact on software development, revealing AI as an amplifier of organizational strengths and weaknesses.

item.title: Tell The People You Love That You Love Them
item.description: Essay about being straightforward with love and not pretending not to care.

item.title: The Road Goes Ever On - J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: Tolkien’s poem about the endless journey through life, appearing in The Hobbit and The Lord of the Rings.

item.title: The Sky Is Not the Limit - Sawyer Rosenstein
item.description: Quote about limitless possibilities when there are footprints on the moon.

item.title: The Star Thrower (Starfish Story)
item.description: Story about making a difference one starfish at a time, despite overwhelming odds.

item.title: We're All Stories in the End - Doctor Who
item.description: The Eleventh Doctor’s farewell about being stories in the end.

item.title: You Are the Reason - Unknown
item.description: Quote about how love brings light to sadness, understanding to confusion, and trust to betrayal.

item.title: സ്മാരകം (Smarakam) - Veerankutty
item.description: Malayalam poem about the humble flight of a dandelion seed and the monument it becomes.

item.title: Paper: A Note On Distributed Computing
item.description: A critique of the ‘unified view’ of local and distributed objects.

item.title: HBR: When It Comes to Influencers, Smaller Can Be Better
item.description: Research on the ROI of nano vs macro influencers.
